attributes.action: To Enforce all British laws in Great Britain both by the police & the courts.
attributes.additional_details:
Today the police are standing back under & watching while certain groups destroy public property & damage private property. They enforce the laws on some people but ignore others for fear of reprisal.
All laws in this nation should be enforced for all people's living in the British Isles without exception.
Anyone who breaks these laws should be sentenced accordingly.
Any & all enforcement officers failing in their duties to do this to be removed from office immediately.
attributes.background: The home office must issue directives to all law enforcement officers to do the duties they swore an oath to do. All British laws to be applied to every person in the United Kingdom no matter what their cultural beliefs. Religious followings or colour.

rejection.details:
This is a matter for the courts and police, not the Government or Parliament
